item.description:
This meeting is open to all members of the Western Mass. 912 Project. Discussion will include what the new direction of our group will be. What we should focus on with our group. Where do we go from here?

Also included will be a look at why the Wmass 912 Project was launched. We will review what we have been doing since we started this group and what our accomplishments have been. How our 912 group has dedicated our time to raising public awareness to the issues, as well as what is going on behind our backs.

What is the future of our 912 newsletter, The People's Pen?

This is an opportunity for the leadership team and all members of the Wmass. 912 Project to share ideas about where we should focus our attention.

Please join us for this important meeting.

 

There is ample parking available behind the church.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the meeting room downstairs at the Bible Baptist Church.
item.name: REGIONAL MEETING for Western Mass. 912 Project
